attributes.action: Abolish Human Trafficking being helped on websites like backpage.com
attributes.additional_details: We plan to ban websites like Backpage which advertise young girls allowing them to be trafficked from country to country. The young girls are wrongfully placed under the "escort" section of the website where any age range of men and women can hire them for there own personal benefit. Despite the managers of the website knowing this they still allow these situtations to occur.
